segments.text: no , no , you helped me with my computer last week . I want to repay the favor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , it's definitely my turn to treat you ... you paid last time !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , that was just a quick bite to eat---that doesn't count !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok , ok , how about we just go Dutch ? It's settled . Listen , I'm still pretty new around here , would it be alright if you found the restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2
